comment._content: Judge Cornelius H. Hanford (1849-1926), Iowa-born, raised in the Pacific Northwest and San Francisco; chief justice for Washington Territory, and later the first US Judge for the District of Washington: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cornelius_H._Hanford
